item.title: Linear and Bayesian Regression Models with tidymodels package
item.description: As a data scientist, you need to distinguish between regression predictive models and classification predictive models. Clear understanding of these models helps to choose the best one for a specific use case. In a nutshell, regression predictive models andclassification predictive models` fall under supervised machine learning. The main difference between them is that the output variableâ€”in regression is numerical (or continuous) while that for classification is categorical (or discrete).
